casebody.data:
MOTION DOCKET

02-292. State v. Jaryga.

Lake App. No. 99-L-179. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal as of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of court of common pleas proceedings,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, denied.

F.E. Sweeney, J., dissents.
